name: Fantasy Story X [Saber Jam 2022]
description:
We wake up in a cart and we have amnesia. A fairy appears and asks us for help in exchange for returning a memory or fulfilling any wish...

Created on Katana Jam 2 (48 hours) https://itch.io/jam/katana-jam-ii/entries

Features:

  • Amazing, breathtaking story line! 
  • Dramatic moral choices and plot twists. 
  • Mind-blowing quests
  • Emotional story.
  • Unbelievable Turn-based combat.
  • Difficult to believe!
  • Phenomenal art and eye-opening graphics
  • 4 epic story endings

Сontrols:

  • Mouse
    • Left Mouse - navigate
    • Esc - main menu

Credits: 

  • Maria Chernomorova
  • Ivan Minets
  • Vladislav Valentyukevich
  • Roman Safin

* Portraits of characters and bosses, and enemies (NPC) view are made by our artist.
